text: Conrad "Cronos" Lant (born 15 January 1963) is the vocalist and bass player in black metal band Venom. He was born in 1963 in London, England. == History == Cronos started to sing in 1978 in the band Guillotine. Then he knew Jeffrey "Mantas" Dunn and they founded Venom. In 1989 Cronos left the band to start a solo work. Venom could not go on without him and they stopped singing in 1993. Then Cronos returned in 1995 and rejoined the band. == Other websites == * Official Venom Website Category:Venom (band) Category:1963 births Category:Living people
title: Conrad Lant
